sentences.en: Characteristic defects are of two main types; regression and syneresis.

sentences.en: Data were analyzed using variance and multiple regression analysis.

sentences.en: In linear regression, the least squares estimation is heavily innuenced with outlyers.

sentences.en: Objective To research the NIPALS regression in the function of eliminating collinearities.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨PLS回归理论在消除多元共线性中的作用.

sentences.en: The concepts of marine transgression and regression are considered to be fundamental.

sentences.en: With this regression equation, we forecast the suitable cooking conditions species respectively.

trans.tran_cn: 衰退，（尤指因催眠或精神疾患，或为逃避目前忧虑）回到从前，回归，（统计学） 回归
